name: Literacy in England, by sex - Schofield (1973), Houston (1982), Cressy (1980)
title: Literacy in England, by sex - Schofield (1973), Houston (1982), Cressy (1980)
description: See Table 1 (pg 204) for original figures. Table 1 provides the percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate)

fields.name: Male literacy rate (Houston (1982))
fields.description: Percentage of male witnesses who sign court depositions, for the North. Years given correspond to the decade, i.e. 1640 estimate covers the period 1640-1649. Original Table 1 (pg 204) gives percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate)

fields.name: Female literacy rate (Houston (1982))
fields.description: Percentage of female witnesses who sign court depositions, for the North. Years given correspond to the decade, i.e. 1640 estimate covers the period 1640-1649. Original Table 1 (pg 204) gives percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate)
